name: Pong with Mario physics 2
description:
A fan game inspired from the animation by level up.

Check out the original video!!!

You can control Mario with the arrow keys, use space bar to jump or exit ponged mode and use X or Z keys to use firepower!

I named it PORIO because I didn't wanted to name it MARIONG. 

Currently under development, I will be adding more stuff very soon... so stay tuned!

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
Sound effects taken from Sounds-resource.com 
Title music by RetroRSP
